tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE BillingHistory (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  customer_id INT,
  energy_usage FLOAT,
  tariff_id INT,
  total_cost FLOAT,
  billing_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE billing_records (
  record_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  customer_id INT,
  consumption_id INT,
  rate_id INT,
  total_cost DECIMAL
);
